title: Ex-Div Reminder for Occidental Petroleum (OXY) - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel  , on 9/9/19, Occidental Petroleum Corp (Symbol: OXY) will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.79, payable on 10/15/19. As a percentage of OXY's recent stock price of $44.18, this dividend works out to approximately 1.79%, so look for shares of Occidental Petroleum Corp to trade 1.79% lower - all else being equal - when OXY shares open for trading on 9/9/19.       In general, dividends are not always predictable; but looking at the history above can help in judging whether the most recent dividend from OXY is likely to continue, and whether the current estimated yield of 7.15% on annualized basis is a reasonable expectation of annual yield going forward. The chart below shows the one year performance of OXY shares, versus its 200 day moving average:  makeArticleAd();     Looking at the chart above, OXY's low point in its 52 week range is $41.825 per share, with $83.35 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $44.14.      In Thursday trading, Occidental Petroleum Corp shares are currently up about 1.4% on the day.   Click here to learn which 25 S.A.F.E. dividend   stocks should be on your radar screen »
